file_content.text: Uhh... Jedi? Thank the stars.
I don't see a Planet Prison anywhere. That's not good.
We've been such fools. Tarnis--he's a Sith!
I've come to stop him. What happened here?
Tarnis tricked us. Said you Jedi were going to shut the project down.
Told us to bring the Planet Prison here. Keep it safe. Thought we were saving the Republic.
We brought Tarnis the prototype. He turned on us. Killed everyone.
I need to know where Tarnis went.
Tell me how to find him.
Don't know--but he took the Planet Prison.
Hang in there. I'll get you to a medical bay.
I'll save you.
No time. Tarnis has the Planet Prison. He'll use it.
You stole a weapon from the Republic. What did you think would happen?
No less than you deserved.
The man's already dying. Don't rub it in.
Never meant to hurt anyone. Please, Tarnis took the Planet Prison. You have to stop him.
Prototype creates a massive heat signature when activated. Run a thermal scan. You'll find Tarnis.
Planet Prison needs time to build up power. Enough time for you to destroy it. Save Coruscant....
Poor man. He didn't deserve this.
I'll run a thermal scan from one of these terminals. Come on....
